statements: SELECT * FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration
SELECT name, age FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, name FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT id, name, age, data_type FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE data_type='string' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, age FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT id, name, age FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT data_type FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration
SELECT * FROM hdfs_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_content FROM hdfs_data WHERE file_path LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, file_path FROM hdfs_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, file_path, data_content FROM hdfs_data WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM sql_data WHERE query = 'SELECT * FROM hdfs_data';
SELECT * FROM hdfs_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT file_path, data_content FROM hdfs_data WHERE id > 10;
SELECT id, file_path, data_content FROM hdfs_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, file_path, data_content FROM hdfs_data WHERE id = 5 OR id = 10 OR id = 15;
SELECT * FROM sql_data WHERE query LIKE '%SELECT%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SQLHadoopIntegration;
SELECT name, age FROM SQLHadoopIntegration WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, job_title FROM SQLHadoopIntegration ORDER BY job_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataProcess WHERE data_type='example';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_date FROM DataAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SQLHadoopIntegration WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, job_title FROM SQLHadoopIntegration WHERE id = 1;
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM DataAnalysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_value FROM DataProcess WHERE data_type LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SQLHadoopIntegration WHERE age <= 40 AND job_title LIKE '%Engineer%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table2;
SELECT column2, column1 FROM table3;
SELECT column3, column4, column2 FROM table4;
SELECT column1, column3, column2 FROM table1;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table1 WHERE column1 > 100
SELECT * FROM table2 WHERE column3 LIKE '%example%'
SELECT column1, column2, column4 FROM table3 WHERE column4 = TRUE ORDER BY column1 DESC
SELECT column2, column3 FROM table4 WHERE column1 < 50 AND column4 = FALSE
SELECT column1, column4, column5 FROM table1 INNER JOIN table4 ON table1.column1 = table4.column1
SELECT * FROM Structured_Data;
SELECT name, age FROM Structured_Data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT content FROM Unstructured_Data WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM Data_Processing ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM Structured_Data ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, content FROM Unstructured_Data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT table_id, status, processed_date FROM SQL_Hadoop_Integration WHERE status = 'completed' AND processed_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT process_id, task_name, start_time, end_time FROM Data_Processing WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00'
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, result FROM Data_Analysis WHERE analysis_type LIKE '%summary%'
